content:
You can transfer multimedia files from your computer to your PSP by following these steps:

1. Connect your PSP to your computer using a USB cable.
2. Turn on your PSP and select USB Connection under the Settings menu.
3. On your computer, open File Explorer and navigate to the folder where your multimedia files are stored.
4. Select the files you want to transfer to your PSP and drag them to the PSP's folder named PSP.
5. Once the transfer is complete, disconnect your PSP from the computer and go to the folder where you saved the files on your PSP.
6. Use the appropriate application on your PSP to access or play the multimedia files you transferred.
